# Git Aliases for REChain IDE
# Add these to your ~/.gitconfig file
# Usage: Copy this content into [alias] section of ~/.gitconfig

[alias]
    # Shortcuts
    st = status
    co = checkout
    br = branch
    ci = commit
    lg = log --oneline --graph --decorate --all
    lga = log --oneline --graph --decorate --all --author-date-order
    
    # Commit shortcuts
    amend = commit --amend --no-edit
    amend-all = commit --amend
    undo = reset HEAD~1 --mixed
    unstage = reset HEAD --
    
    # Branch management
    cb = checkout -b
    db = branch -d
    D = branch -D
    brm = branch --merged
    brnm = branch --no-merged
    
    # Log formatting
    ls = log --pretty=format:"%C(yellow)%h%Cred%d\\ %Creset%s%Cblue\\ [%cn]" --decorate
    ll = log --pretty=format:"%C(yellow)%h%Cred%d\\ %Creset%s%Cblue\\ [%cn]" --decorate --numstat
    ld = log --pretty=format:"%C(yellow)%h\\ %ad%Cred%d\\ %Creset%s%Cblue\\ [%cn]" --decorate --date=short
    hist = log --pretty=format:"%h %ad | %s%d [%an]" --graph --date=short
    
    # Finding things
    find = log --all --oneline --source --remotes --grep
    who = log --all --oneline --source --remotes --author
    
    # Stash shortcuts
    save = stash push -m
    pop = stash pop
    drop = stash drop
    list = stash list
    
    # Pull/Push with rebase
    pr = pull --rebase
    pom = push origin main
    pod = push origin develop
    
    # Diff shortcuts
    diffw = diff --word-diff
    diffc = diff --cached
    
    # Rebase shortcuts
    rb = rebase
    rbc = rebase --continue
    rba = rebase --abort
    rbs = rebase --skip
    
    # Cherry-pick shortcuts
    cp = cherry-pick
    cpa = cherry-pick --abort
    cpc = cherry-pick --continue
    
    # Reset shortcuts
    rh = reset --hard
    rs = reset --soft
    
    # Fetch shortcuts
    fo = fetch origin
    fa = fetch --all --prune
    
    # Remote management
    rv = remote -v
    ru = remote update
    rp = remote prune
    
    # Tagging
    tagl = tag -l
    tags = tag -l -n1
    
    # Cleanup
    cleanup = "!git branch --merged | grep -v '^\\*' | xargs -n 1 git branch -d"
    clean-branches = "!git branch --merged | grep -v '^\\*' | grep -v 'main\\|develop' | xargs -n 1 git branch -d"
    prune-all = "!git remote | xargs -n 1 git remote prune"
    
    # Current branch info
    current = rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD
    upstream = rev-parse --abbrev-ref --symbolic-full-name @{u}
    
    # Repo info
    root = rev-parse --show-toplevel
    size = count-objects -vH
    
    # Interactive
    ri = rebase -i
    rc = rebase --continue
    
    # Safe force push
    pushf = push --force-with-lease
    
    # Better clone
    clonecd = "!git clone $@ && cd "${1##*/}""
    
    # Worktree shortcuts
    wtl = worktree list
    wta = worktree add
    wtrm = worktree remove
    
    # Useful combinations
    refresh = "!git fetch origin && git status"
    sync = "!git checkout main && git pull origin main && git checkout develop && git pull origin develop"
    update = "!git pull --rebase origin $(git current)"
    
    # Conventional commit helpers
    feat = "!git commit -m \"feat: $1\""
    fix = "!git commit -m \"fix: $1\""
    docs = "!git commit -m \"docs: $1\""
    chore = "!git commit -m \"chore: $1\""
    test = "!git commit -m \"test: $1\""
    refactor = "!git commit -m \"refactor: $1\""
    perf = "!git commit -m \"perf: $1\""
    ci = "!git commit -m \"ci: $1\""
    build = "!git commit -m \"build: $1\""
    style = "!git commit -m \"style: $1\""
    revert = "!git commit -m \"revert: $1\""

# Example .gitconfig structure:
# [user]
#     name = Your Name
#     email = your.email@example.com
# [alias]
#     (paste aliases above here)
